CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In most reported cases , the band gaps of conjugated polymers are reduced by incorporating more thiophene units between the donor and the acceptor segments owing to the more extended and delocalized π-electron system.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| conjugated polymers |
| thiophene |
| donor |
| acceptor |

Note: In the given paragraph, "conjugated polymers" and "thiophene" are the two material names mentioned. "Donor" and "acceptor" are not material names, but rather terms used to describe the components of a conjugated polymer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
